short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Extension for inserting timestamps of VOA Learning English

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension can be applied to articles on the VOA Learning English "Lessons of the DAY" :

https://learningenglish.voanews.com/z/952

You can use this extension to add timestamps to paragraphs of VOA Learning English articles. By clicking on the added timestamps, you can replay those paragraphs, and eventually export them as SRT subtitle files.

Main Features:
* Add playback timestamps at the cursor position.
* Convert time and text into SRT format subtitle files.
* Extend audio playback functionality with the following additions:
  * Backwards
  * Forwards
  * Speed Down
  * Speed Up

* Support controlling extended functions with hotkeys, as follows:
  * [F1] Backwards
  * [F2] Forwards
  * [F3] Speed Down
  * [F4] Speed Up
  * [Esc] Play or Pause
  * [Ctrl + J] Insert timestamp

* Support gamepad controlling.
